name: Plance
description:
Plance is an atmospheric game, in a military camp from another time.

Your goal is to take as many things as possible and put them in the bunker before the alarm. When the alaram come get to the bunker and escape.

Controls : 

WASD (and ZQSD) : Move

Shift : Run

E : Take/Use,

Left Click : Throw

Right Click : Zoom

Made with :

Godot Game Engine, Blender, Krita, Audacity

Item Highlighter Shader by OzMaister

CC0 Sounds from freesound.org
